name: Call of Coronga
description:
LAST OPPORTUNITY IN THE WORLD


Inspired by the classic Call of Duty game, specifically in Zombie Mode. Call of Coronga seeks to bring fun and humor about an unfortunate pandemic!

GRIPPED


In my opinion, it is the most fun way to play, of course, the online mode. In this mode, you must explore as much as possible to face different hordes of people.


ONLINE MODE


Have you ever imagined facing the damn Corona virus with your friends? Now you can! Call of Coronga is perfect for this, in the game you can create rooms online and play on several different maps. Surviving as long as possible without being infected will not be an easy task!

Inspired by Call of Duty Zombie Mode, you and your friends can spend hours playing together in an extremely fun game mode.

ONLINE ROOM TYPES



  • PVP MODE
  • COOPERATIVE MODE

PVP MODE


In this Online mode, you can face your friends in an equal PVP or CSGO online room.

COOPERATIVE MODE


Just like the Gripados mode, together with your friends, you can resist as long as possible a horde of flu infected by Corona Virus.
